title: (x) Donovan Purcell "Cambridge Stone" book cover serif type - similar to Octavian {Florian}
content:
Any help would be very much appreciated.

Ed

comments.content: Apologies, struggling to upload an image
[Octavian](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/octavian/familytree.html) is very similar, but no cigar …
When was this book published? Has [David Kindersley](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153142/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/David%252BKindersley) designed book covers, too?

thank you Florian, Octavian is pretty good

Published in 1967 by Faber and Faber  
Kindersley is a good thought
